attributes.action: Abolish The Transfer of Football Players Under The Age of 18 Via The F.A. & Football League Tribunal System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In light of John Bostocks transfer from Crystal Palace F.C. to Tottenham Hotsfur F.C. I request the Abolishion of The Transfer of Football Players Under The Age of 18 Via The F.A. & Football League Tribunal System in order to protect the Business needs of the Selling Club.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
